body_html: @shawnjhenry incoming gradient? I thought it was a forward pass masking? Sorry if seeming slow on this, I think I've been spoiled by theano, and all of the theano-based libraries I've worked with have used the sentinel-based mask.
body_text: @shawnjhenry incoming gradient? I thought it was a forward pass masking?  Sorry if seeming slow on this, I think I've been spoiled by theano, and all of the theano-based libraries I've worked with have used the sentinel-based mask.
body: @shawnjhenry incoming gradient? I thought it was a forward pass masking?  Sorry if seeming slow on this, I think I've been spoiled by theano, and all of the theano-based libraries I've worked with have used the sentinel-based mask.
